definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: built by Solomon, acc. to 1Ki 9:18 Qr = 2Ch 8:8; Tadmor = Palmyra (RS:Ency. Brit. (9) PALMYBA Mommsen:Röm. Gesch. v. 423, cf. Lag:BN 125); but read in both places [[תָּמָר]] Th RS:1. c. Mommsen:1, c. Kmp Benz Kit Bur Reckend:ZMG xiii (1888), 402 Lag:1. c. GASm:Geogr, 270, N. 2; 580, N. 2; v. II. [[תָּמָר]]. p. 1071
